resources.string:
Songs:
 search song_name
 play song "song_name"
 play recent
 play popular
 play random song
 delete song "song_name"
 search song_name
 
 Playlists:
 create playlist playlist_name
 play playlist "playlist_name"
 delete playlist "playlist_name"
 play random playlist
 
 Control:
 stop
 pause
 continue
 
 Other:
 add "song_name" to "playlist_name"
 remove "song_name" from "playlist_name"
